aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWFStandAloneRuleEngine) (Def Version:1) (Implem Version:1)
uses aWFRuleDesc, aWFStandAloneRule
Age : Int4 InterestRate : Int4
function MortalityTable(Age : Int4) return Num8 var tmpRule : aWFRuleDesc
tmpRule = self.GetExactRuleToExecuteFromRankInRuleDesc(0, self.CurrentDate) if tmpRule <> Nil aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Age, 0, tmpRule) tmpRule.GetStandAloneResult(_Result, self) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).CleanParamsAfterExecution(tmpRule) else self.AppendComment('No rule version defined at this date') endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Num8) var i : Int4
if self.Age < 120 for i = 1 to 120 - self.Age Result += self.MortalityTable(self.Age + i) * 1 / self.Power(1 + self.InterestRate, i) endFor Result = Result / self.MortalityTable(self.Age) Result = 1 / Result endIf endProc

aWFStandAloneTable.Name: MortalityTable

aWFRuleDesc.Name: Indefinite Annuity

aWFStandAloneRule.Name: IndefiniteAnnuityRate
